name: SubPathItem
shortdesc: Information about a path. You do not use the sub path item object to create a path. Rather, you create path segments using the sub path info object. Use the sub path item object to retrieve information about a path. All properties are read-only.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: closed
property.shortdesc: If true, the path is closed.

property.name: operation
property.shortdesc: The sub path operation on other sub paths.

property.name: pathPoints
property.shortdesc: The path points collection in the sub path.
